_rianz0jcdlc29r29.name: VWAP {stdevMultiplier}

_00prajldknnkl00j.name: Keltner Channel
_00prajldknnkl00j.script:
price = avg_ohlc(bar)
close = avg_close(bar)

range = price.high - price.low
averageRange = sma(range, options.length)

basis = ema(close, options.length)
dev = options.mult * averageRange
upper = basis + dev
lower = basis - dev

plotline(basis, color=options.basisColor)
plotcloudarea(lower, upper)

_2w0txanc06wbpy6r.name: RSI

delta-binance-spot.script:
_vbuy = (BINANCE:btcbusd.vbuy+BINANCE:btcusdc.vbuy+BINANCE:btcusdt.vbuy)
_vsell = (BINANCE:btcbusd.vsell+BINANCE:btcusdc.vsell+BINANCE:btcusdt.vsell)

volume = _vbuy+_vsell
a = sma(Math.pow(volume,2),options.length)
b = Math.pow(sum(volume,options.length),2)/Math.pow(options.length,2)
stdev = Math.sqrt(a - b)
basis = sma(volume, options.length)
dev = 1 * stdev
treshold = basis + dev

delta = _vbuy - _vsell

plothistogram({ time: time, value: (delta), color: delta > 0 ? ( volume > treshold ? options.upColorHighVol : options.upColorLowVol) : ( volume > treshold ? options.downColorHighVol : options.downColorLowVol)}, title="Binance S")
delta-binance-spot.name: Delta Binance Spot

delta-coinbase.script:

_5y7z61uhwa4pk8q7.name: Delta Kraken
_5y7z61uhwa4pk8q7.script:
_vbuy = (KRAKEN:PL_XBTUSD.vbuy+KRAKEN:XBT/USD.vbuy+KRAKEN:XBT/USDC.vbuy+KRAKEN:XBT/USDT.vbuy)
_vsell = (KRAKEN:PL_XBTUSD.vsell+KRAKEN:XBT/USD.vsell+KRAKEN:XBT/USDC.vsell+KRAKEN:XBT/USDT.vsell)
volume = _vbuy+_vsell
a = sma(Math.pow(volume,2),options.length)
b = Math.pow(sum(volume,options.length),2)/Math.pow(options.length,2)
stdev = Math.sqrt(a - b)
basis = sma(volume, options.length)
dev = 1 * stdev
treshold = basis + dev
delta = _vbuy - _vsell
plothistogram({ time: time, value: (delta), color: delta > 0 ? ( volume > treshold ? options.upColorHighVol : options.upColorLowVol) : ( volume > treshold ? options.downColorHighVol : options.downColorLowVol)}, title="Kraken")
